original_title: Dead Man's Carnival: A Conversation with Pinkerton Xyloma
overview: Award-winning filmmaker, Casey T. Malone, turns his lens onto Milwaukee's performance collaborative and DIY punk rock circus, Dead Man's Carnival, to create a unique short documentary told through the historical tales and philosophies of Professor Pinkerton Xyloma, ringmaster of the carnival.
title: Dead Man's Carnival: A Conversation with Pinkerton Xyloma
